review:
It's a game.
[h1]Thoughts on Overwatch 2: Invasion[/h1]
The paid story missions should have been free, they're barebones and the plot is extremely scarce. There's potential there but it ends extremely quickly. As soon as you press the purchase button, you'll regret actually buying it. With the monetization they're doing, it's extremely scummy to also ask for money for story missions when there's also $20 dollar skins in the shop. Especially when the OW community has been waiting years for story missions. At the end of the 3 short missions, it has the audacity to ask you to [b]upgrade[/b] your intial Invasion pack to the ultimate version. 
I feel like there should be some sort of apology to players who expected things from Blizzard but there will never be compensation or actual love towards the game, it's players or their own developers. At the least, I can only show love to the art team and past developers who have worked tirelessly only for Blizzard to throw that passion away.
[h1]Overwatch 2?[/h1]
Overwatch is still a fun game despite the move to 5v5. There are a lot of problems and issues but if you want some quick fun, it's still Overwatch at the end of the day. The new player grind as a free-to-play is quite daunting though. I don't think they should time gate heroes for 32(?)+ games . (You have to win those games too so that'll be a while before you actually unlock everyone) I don't think it's pay-to-win and more so pay-for-convenience since you can actually unlock those characters for free. The main monetization draw are the skins and battle pass. The legendary shop skins are at a ludicrous 20 dollars, which is insane especially when it's for 1 character. 
[h1]Free to Play experience[/h1]
So, how free is it? You can get 60 coins per week. [b]Don't expect to get anything as a free-to-play player. Pay up.[/b] I think the whole system is a step down from what was in OW1 which is the universal opinion right now. It focuses too much on FOMO and tries to lure you to the shop to buy things. It's decent if you want to play but if you want cosmetics be prepared to cough up money. 
[h1]Flashpoint[/h1]
I want to say that it's on par with Push. Not too great or too bad. It's a mediocre game mode that can get confusing really quickly because of the large map and rotating spawns. Both maps have similar colors to me which kinda makes it feel like they're all 1 map. I still need to play more to get a good grasp of things but it's kinda middling right now.
[h1]Final thoughts[/h1]
I have lots of love towards Overwatch but I wish they could get their shit together for once. I love the game and everything about it but there are too many issues to actually recommend anyone this game with my full confidence. Maybe in the future when they tone down all this stuff, eh probably not it's Blizzard. 🫢🤮🤮🤮🤮

I've had Overwatch 1 through 2  when it first came out and 1 was great (loot boxes feel way better than a SCAM OF A BATTLE PASS). My final conclusion is that blizzard has the same mindset as someone who thought the American School System was a great idea today. An example of their stupidity is from today where I was playing the game because of the new character and I see it as my favorite support so far. I was also surprised that the character was FREE finally; which makes sense for a game where meta matters (I mean, every other fighting games has the same problem; but that's besides the point). BUT...but but but...the servers all of the sudden did an "update" where she's only available where YOU HAVE TO BUY HER IF YOU DON'T WANNA PLAY 50+ GAMES. That'll takes way to long; AND IMAGINE FOR THE OTHER CHARACTERS WHEN THEY WERE ON THE BATTLEPASS. IMAGINE GOING THROUGH THESE CHARACTERS ONE BY ONE THROUGH BATTLEPASS OR EVEN THE CHALLENGES. When i was looking at lifeweaver. It wanted me to play 35 games of open queue which is completely stupid. If i want to  play the characters I have to do those 200+ matches of games quite possibly or buy them. BUYING THEM IS MORE EXPENSIVE THAN ANY OTHER FIGHTING GAME CHARACTER. Fighting game DLC is usually like 5 bucks per a character or 20 bucks for a whole season of characters which isn't much. BUT THIS GAME; IT'S 10 DOLLARS PER A CHARACTER GOD DAMMIT. YOU CAN'T MAKE THIS STUFF UP! YOU'RE SPENDING 50 + (15 FOR THE BATTLEPASS) DOLLARS TO PLAY THE CHARACTERS THIS IS ONLY FOR A 6 CHARACTERS VS A SEASON PASS THAT'LL COST YOU 20 BUCKS FOR 6 OR MORE. GUESS WHAT; FIGHTING GAMES ALSO PROVIDE FREE CONTENT SUCH AS PVE WITHOUT MAKING YOU SPEND MORE THAN WHAT YOU'VE PURCHASED OR EVEN A FREE FIGHTING GAME. While that's one problem of the game; there's another, being a big fat liar. THEY'VE PROMISED SO MUCH BUT NEVER DELIVERED A SINGLE TIME IN THEIR LIFE. PVE, CUT EVERYTHING THAT WAS PROMISED, LOCKING HEROES WHEN THEY SAID THEY WON'T, AND MANY MORE THAT I DON'T WANT TO FIND AND BE SAD ABOUT. I don't know how you fail a game harder than any other game I've ever seen. How the hell does Paladins have a better hero unlocking system than OW2. TEAM FORTRESS 2 HAS LESS SUPPORT BUT A BETTER FREE TO PLAY SYSTEM THEN ANY OTHER GAME I'VE EVER SEEN. Illari was literally my favorite hero in the support role and I can't play her without banging my head against the wall 50 times. Fuck you blizzard and I hope you go bankrupt.

以前身边没有玩游戏的朋友，电脑也垃圾，所以自己也几乎没咋玩游戏。

2021年进入大三下，课业完成得差不多了，进入一段较为悠闲的时期， 心血来潮下回了2016年购买并注册的守望先锋。得益于ow还不错的优化和十分合我胃口的动漫画风，我上手很快，一下子打到70多级并开始入迷。那个时候，我的电脑没有steam也没有其他任何游戏，只有ow。虽然每次游玩只能开中低画质稳30-40帧，虽然我根本不敢打排位因为在青铜都被乱杀，但是我玩的很开心。

2022年夏天毕业，父母让我自己挑选并给我换了台电脑。拿到新电脑以后，我才发现能以高画质高帧率玩游戏有多爽，心情超级激动，好像打开了新世界一样。

2022年秋天，渐渐地我在游戏里结识了越来越多素未谋面的人。但是有两个朋友，因为他们我每天晚上都能得到准时的“召唤”，那段时间我每晚都迫不及待地打开电脑和他们一起觉得人有趣说话又好听（？）。我以一个新来者的身份盘踞在队伍里，和许许多多朋友的朋友组队打了游戏。我第一次享受到和朋友在一起才能感受到的无与伦比的快乐（这也许又是一扇新世界的大门罢）。这是我未曾有过的体验。

ow2开服后，我尝试了重新挑战排位。在和朋友们轻松愉快（bushi）的排位之旅过后居然打到了铂金。这对我来说是一个不小的惊喜。我突然意识到，原来我对游戏的爱还在那里，从未消逝。得到这份鼓舞之后，我开始尝试steam上感兴趣的游戏，发现也很有意思。这个阶段之后，我的游戏生活从此被彻底点燃了。

ow这个游戏对很多人都很重要，对我更是意义非凡。我能感觉到这这是一款非常优秀的游戏，创意，配乐，美术等等许多地方都有着高艺术水准和独特的魅力（指ow1）。我在ow里的那些数据记录的是我快乐开黑的对局，是我的成长轨迹，是只有我一个人能读出的无可替代的回忆。但是因为暴雪它们竟然就这样猝不及防地被彻底清空，我无法接受。

游戏是好游戏，朋友很幸运地也还有机会重聚在一起。但是暴雪，你是真的垃圾👎👎👎

I'm not gonna waste your time here.
I've played since 2016 and the game itself is good/fun, [b]HOWEVER[/b] the current developers have little to no respect for the player base, the game is riddled with bugs (characters like Doomfist are literally unplayable because of this) and has massive balancing issues.
The current direction the devs are going in leaves me with little to no confidence in the games future, I absolutely cannot recommend it to new or returning players. The glory days of Overwatch ended in 2019. 2020 onward has just been the devs beating a dead horse.
If u wanna play it, go for it, knock yourself out. [b]Just please do not pay for anything!!![/b]

2023炉石赛事禁止中国玩家参与。
纪念《暗黑破坏神4》上线挑战活动特别注明，“玩家不得为中华人民共和国的居民（港澳台除外）”。
OWL的韩国选手SBB不当言论事件，前期暴雪一声不吭，我们中国队伍自发抵制时却站出来施压。
2023魔兽世界将历来都是在春节前夕或者当天开的春节活动，挪到了24号大年初三+停服当日。
当年的魔兽争霸重制版就画了大饼，如今ow2的pve也画了大饼，最终拖延这么多年的pve成了阉割版，而且必须付费才能够获得。
steam上的ow2需要绑定国际服账号，和你的国服账号没有任何关系，你国服充的钱变为泡影，你的皮肤金枪数据等等全部都需要从头再来。

如果看完上面这些你还是愿意给出好评，那我只能祝你游戏愉快。
最后，暴雪真该死啊！

这款游戏很好但是感觉不如韩信
韩信的被动技能：杀意之枪
释放技能命中目标后的攻速加成可以让韩信打出更多的普攻伤害，提高他的打野以及清兵效率，第四次普攻的击飞效果可以让韩信更容易留下敌人。
一技能：无情冲锋  该技能为韩信提供了两次位移能力，首次释放该技能命中敌人可以将其挑飞，常用于抓人时先手控制敌人。
二技能：背水一战  该技能可以加强韩信的普攻伤害，与一技能搭配使用可以让韩信瞬间拥有三次位移能力。值得一提的是，直接使用该技能会往后位移，若想朝敌人方向突进需要进行反向操作。
大招：国士无双  该技能拥有多段物理伤害，最后一击可以击飞韩信周围的目标，常用于开团进场时释放，能打出足够输出并且提供团控效果。释放该技能过程中韩信是处于霸体状态的，可以骗取敌人的控制技能。

I've been fortunate/unfortunate enough to have been playing this game since it's beta. It's like watching a loved one slowly die in front of your eyes, in the end bearing little to no resemblance to the thing you once loved.  To anyone thinking about getting involved in this game, here are some things to consider...

- The game has become microtransaction hell, with new heroes and any decent cosmetics being locked behind either a battlepass or a beefy paywall. We're talking $20 skins here. 
- It fosters one of the most toxic communities. The game requires all players to pull their weight, so new players are often flagged for throwing when they're just trying to learn the game. Since the game switched to free-to-play, players banned for abusive chat end up just making an alternate account and continue to flame. Which leads me to my next point...
- COMMUNITY REPORTS ARE HANDLED BY BOTS. Meaning if you're reported enough times by people, regardless of whatever happened, you'll eventually get suspended and then banned. So if you are A.) a newb trying to learn the game or B.) a white-knight calling out a team of white-supremacists then you can kiss all your cosmetics and hours goodbye. 
- Not to mention the numerous empty promises from developers, completely tone-deaf character changes, horrible balancing issues, a dying/dead competitive scene and the most toxic competitive match-making in any game.

In summary, the only person who can save Overwatch is Jeff Kaplin. But alas, he remains beyond our reach having feared what he created. May Jeffrey save us all.
